The Motley Fool.name: The Motley Fool
The Motley Fool.address: 2000 Duke St., Fourth Floor, Alexandria, VA 22314
The Motley Fool.notes: You arrive in a large, clock-shaped arena.
The Motley Fool.restroom_description: There are restrooms located inside the office building.
The Motley Fool.food_description: Restaurants within walking distance (e.g. Quiznos, Einstein Bros. Bagels).

Air Force Memorial.name: Air Force Memorial
Air Force Memorial.address: One Air Force Memorial Drive, Arlington, VA 22204
Air Force Memorial.notes: The Memorial is free and open to the public every day of the year except Christmas Day.
Air Force Memorial.restroom_description: There are restrooms located inside the office building.
Air Force Memorial.food_description: Restaurants within walking distance (e.g. Quiznos, Einstein Bros. Bagels).
